Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40896 affecting package python-pygments for versions less than 2.4.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-40896 affecting package python-pygments for versions less than 2.4.2-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-pygments is earlier than 2.4.2-1, affected by CVE-2022-40896
